classitems.description:
Sets or possibly creates the current document and returns it. 
If the param doc is not given the current document gets set to the active document 
in the application. If no document at all is open, a new document gets created.
classitems.name: doc

params.name: doc
params.description: The document to set the current document to.

params.name: file
params.description: The indesign file instance to save the document to

classitems.description: Returns the current page and possibly sets it.
classitems.name: page

params.name: page
params.description: The page or page index to set the current page to.

classitems.description: Returns the current layer and possibly sets it.
classitems.name: layer

params.name: layer
params.description: The layer or layer name to set the current layer to.

classitems.description: Sets the units of the document (like right clicking the rulers).
classitems.name: units

params.name: units
params.description: supported: PT, PX, CM or MM

classitems.description: Draws an ellipse (oval) in the display window. An ellipse with an equal width and height is a circle. The first two parameters set the location, the third sets the width, and the fourth sets the height.

return.description: new oval (in Adobe Scripting the type is Oval, not ellipse)

classitems.description: Draws a line (a direct path between two points) to the screen.
Draws a rectangle to the page.

Creates a new RGB or CMYK color and adds the new color to the document,
or gets a color by name from the document

params.name: Get
params.description: color: name. Create new color: R,G,B,name or C,M,Y,K,name or Grey,name. Name is always optional

classitems.description:
Creates a text frame on the current layer on the current page in the current document. 
The text frame gets created in the position specified by the x and y parameters.
The default document font will be used unless a font is set with the textFont() function. 
Change the color of the text with the fill() function.
The text displays in relation to the textAlign() function, which gives the option to draw to the left, 
right, and center of the coordinates. 
The width and height parameters define a rectangular area.
classitems.name: text

params.name: txt
params.description: The text content to set in the text frame.

classitems.description:
Sets text properties to the given item. If the item is not an instance the text property can be set to, 
the property gets set to the direct descendants of the given item, e.g. all stories of a given document.

If no value is given and the given property is a string, the function acts as a getter and returns the 
corresponding value(s) in an array. This can either be an array containing the value of the concrete item 
(e.g. character) the values of the item's descendants (e.g. paragraphs of given text frame).
classitems.name: typo

params.name: item
params.description: The object to apply the property to.

params.name: property
params.description:
The text property name of an object of key/value property/value pairs.
                                  If property is a string and no value is given, the function acts as getter.

params.name: value
params.description: The value to apply to the property.

return.description:
The property value(s) if the function acts as getter or the items the property 
                             was assigned to.

classitems.description:
Adds an image to the document. The image file must be in the "[indesign\_scripts\_path]/data" directory 
to load correctly (e.g. "~/Library/Preferences/Adobe InDesign/Version 7.5/en_GB/Scripts/Scripts Panel/data").
The second argument can either be the x position of the frame to create or an instance of a rectangle, 
oval or polygon to place the image in.
If x and y positions are given and width and height are not given, the frame's size gets set to the original image size.
classitems.name: image

params.name: img
params.description: The image file name in the "[indesign\_scripts\_path]/data" directory

params.name: itemOrX
params.description: The x position on the current page or the item instance to place the image in

params.name: y
params.description: The y position on the current page. Ignored if itemOrX is not a number.

params.name: w
params.description: The width of the rectangle to add the image to. Ignored if itemOrX is not a number.

params.name: h
params.description: The height of the rectangle to add the image to. Ignored if itemOrX is not a number.

return.description: The item instance the image was placed in.

classitems.description: Returns items tagged with the given label in the InDesign Script Label pane (Window -> Utilities -> Script Label).
classitems.name: findByLabel

return.description: Array of concrete PageItem instances, e.g. TextFrame or SplineItem.
